basics.name: Christina Chen
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2021.

courses: Intro to Computer Science I and II (taught in Java)

highlights: Restock display cases and tidy up items on shelves
Chop spines off books to prepare for scanning its loose pages
Scan loosened pages of whole books
Transfer raw scans to external hard drive

awards.title: Chancellor's Scholarship (a New Warrior Scholarship)
awards.summary: Goal of this scholarship is to support incoming freshmen to the University of Hawaii at Manoa.

awards.title: Fred and Annie Chan Tuition Scholarship
awards.awarder: Mr. Fred Chan and Ms. Annie Chan (alumni of the University of Hawaii at Manoa)
awards.summary: Scholarship awarded as a regional winner of the NCWITT Award for Aspirations in Computing (AspireIT). Goal is to support incoming ICS students to the University of Hawaii at Manoa.

awards.title: NCWITT Award for Aspirations in Computing (AspireIT) for local affiliate
awards.awarder: National Center for Women & Information Technology (NCWIT)
